CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both copolymers exhibit a sharp and intense ( 100 ) diffraction peak at 2θ = 4.2 ° corresponding to the interchain distance ( d 100 ) of 21.0 Å , while the ( 010 ) diffraction peak was observed at 19.4 ° for PTATDPP and 19.1 ° for PTAFDPP , corresponding to the π-π stacking distance ( d 010 ) of 4.6 Å and 4.7 Å , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers (specific types not mentioned, so no need to include in table) |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both copolymers exhibit a sharp and intense ( 100 ) diffraction peak at 2θ = 4.2 ° corresponding to the interchain distance ( d 100 ) of 21.0 Å , while the ( 010 ) diffraction peak was observed at 19.4 ° for PTATDPP and 19.1 ° for PTAFDPP , corresponding to the π-π stacking distance ( d 010 ) of 4.6 Å and 4.7 Å , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| interchain distance (d 100) |
| π-π stacking distance (d 010) |
| diffraction peak intensity (sharp and intense for both copolymers) |
| 2θ value for the (100) diffraction peak (2θ = 4.2 ° for both copolymers) |
| interchain distance for PTATDPP (d 100 for PTATDPP) |
| interchain distance for PTAFDPP (d 100 for PTAFDPP) |
| π-π stacking distance for PTATDPP (d 010 for PTATDPP) |
| π-π stacking distance for PTAFDPP (d 010 for PTAFDPP) |
| value of 2θ for the (010) diffraction peak for PTATDPP (19.4 °) |
| value of 2θ for the (010) diffraction peak for PTAFDPP (19.1 °) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| interchain distance (d 100) for PTATDPP |
| interchain distance (d 100) for PTAFDPP |
| π-π stacking distance (d 010) for PTATDPP |
| π-π stacking distance (d 010) for PTAFDPP |

These properties are material properties as they describe the spatial relationships between the molecular structures of the copolymers.
